## Specification Section

Which chapter and section does this relate to?

- **Chapter:** (e.g., 02 -- Action-Based Access)
- **Section:** (e.g., 2.3.4 -- Opaque Handle Resolution)
- **Requirement:** (e.g., "Implementations MUST resolve handles before subprocess execution")

## Type of Feedback

- [ ] Ambiguity -- requirement is unclear or can be interpreted multiple ways
- [ ] Edge case -- scenario not covered by the specification
- [ ] Improvement -- suggestion to strengthen a requirement
- [ ] Conflict -- two requirements appear to contradict each other
- [ ] Security concern -- potential threat model gap

## Description

Describe the issue or suggestion in detail.

## Proposed Change

If you have a specific wording change in mind, include it here. Use RFC 2119 keywords (MUST, SHOULD, MAY) deliberately.

## Impact

What conformance levels does this affect?

- [ ] Basic (L1-L3)
- [ ] Standard (L1-L5)
- [ ] Advanced (L1-L7)
